DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study 1 ) evaluate extent absorption multiple dos three pregabalin control release tablet compare multiple dos pregabalin immediate release capsule , 2 ) evaluate pharmacokinetics multiple dos three pregabalin control release tablet compare multiple dos pregabalin immediate release capsule 3 ) evaluate safety tolerability multiple dos three pregabalin control release tablet compare multiple dos pregabalin immediate release capsule .
DOC.brief_title: An Investigation Absorption Pharmacokinetics Multiple Doses Three Controlled Release Pregabalin Tablets Compared Multiple Doses Immediate Release Pregabalin Capsule
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Between age 18 55 year , inclusive Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 Illicit drug use Pregnant nursing female Females childbearing potential unwilling unable use acceptable method contraception
